listitem.para: file rwClustal.cpp
Library routines to read and write Clustal sequence files.
file rwEMBL.cpp
Library routines to read and write EMBL sequence files.
file rwFASTA.cpp
Library routines to read and write FASTA sequence files.
file rwGenBank.cpp
Library routines to read and write GenBank sequence files.
file rwGROMACS.cpp
Library routines to read and write GROMACS coordinate files.
file rwmol_star.cpp
Library routines to read and write molecule files in STAR format.
file rwmol_text.cpp
Library routines to read and write molecule files in plain text.
file rwmolecule.cpp
Library routines to read and write molecule file, including sequences and coordinates.
file rwPDB.cpp
Library routines to read and write PDB coordinate files.
file rwPhylip.cpp
Library routines to read and write Phylip sequence files.
file rwPIR.cpp
Library routines to read and write PIR sequence files.
file rwWAH.cpp
Library routines to read and write Wayne Hendrickson coordinate files.
